00010 
00011 #include <nibo/niboconfig.h>
00012 #include <nibo/bot.h>
00013 #include <nibo/iodefs.h>
00014 #include <nibo/sound.h>
00015 
00016 #include "n2sound.h"
00017 
00024 int tone(int frequency, int duration) {
00025         int interval = (50000 / frequency);
00026         duration = duration * 100;
00027 
00028         while (duration) {
00029                 int i = interval;
00030                 clear_output_bit(IO_AUDIO);
00031                 while (duration && i) {
00032                         duration--;
00033                         i--;
00034                         delay_us(10);
00035                 }
00036                 i = interval;
00037                 set_output_bit(IO_AUDIO);
00038                 while (duration && i) {
00039                         duration--;
00040                         i--;
00041                         delay_us(10);
00042                 }
00043 
00044         }
00045 
00046         return 1;
00047 }
